love.gamepadaxis.description: Called when a Joystick's virtual gamepad axis is moved.

love.gamepadpressed.description: Called when a Joystick's virtual gamepad button is pressed.

love.gamepadreleased.description: Called when a Joystick's virtual gamepad button is released.

love.joystickadded.description: Called when a Joystick is connected. This callback is also triggered after love.load for every Joystick which was already connected when the game started up.

love.joystickaxis.description: Called when a joystick axis moves.

love.joystickhat.description: Called when a joystick hat direction changes.

love.joystickpressed.description: Called when a joystick button is pressed.

love.joystickreleased.description: Called when a joystick button is released.

love.joystickremoved.description: Called when a Joystick is disconnected.
